participants.name: Tejal(TJ) Wagadia
participants.title: Senior Technical Recruiter|Frustrated Recruiter Blogger| Part-time Wonder Woman

messages.message:
Sr. Software Developer!

Hi Brian, 

I came across your profile and was very impressed by your skill set. I am currently looking to fill a Sr. Software Developer opportunity for a client of mine in Phoenix, AZ. 
I see that you have been with Swiftpage for a while, are you ready to make a move yet? 

They are looking for someone with 4 years of experience. They are paying about 110-120k/year. This is a FTE for the right person who wants to grow within the company with great benefits. With a 30% market share, they are the leading software platform for outpatient rehab therapy providers. Weâ€™re entirely web-based and operate under a SaaS model. 

Let me know when you have a few moments to chat.

Tejal TJ Wagadia
Senior Technical Recruiter
tj@codigoconnect.com
480-291-8033
Its with a company called WebPT
Oh cool. Ive been to their office. They use Agile.
You have already interviewed with them?
Would you want to pursue this opportunity?
Awesome, lets chat? When do you have time?
